The Spread of Malevolence

Release year:
1997

James's old star rating:

★★★☆☆

FAIRLY GOOD

James's old number rating:

9/10

YouTube (edited by Conrad Studios):

Bitchute archive:

Old site description:

This is a remake of my classic “A Night of Total Terror” with a revised script, more attention given to lighting and editing and better cinematography. It was going to be good and I was looking forward to shooting the cemetery battle climax, but my co-star was never available and this movie was never completed.

YouTube description:

A secret gem from director James Rolfe of the Cinemassacre Productions. The never-released Cinemassacre classic “The Spread of Malevolence” has now been re-edited and digitally remastered by Conrad Studios. Featuring music from Brand X.

James's old ratings:

Back in 2003 James included star ratings with each film he listed on his filmography on his website (the text under the star rating was his description of what the star rating meant). Later on he switched to ratings out of ten.

Eventually, he dropped the ratings entirely.

This archive is unoffical and run by a fan of Cinemassacre. Contact the Archivist
